titleStmt.title: The life of the Right Reverend Father in God, Edw. Rainbow, D.D. late Lord Bishop of Carlisle to which is added, a sermon preached at his funeral by Thomas Tully, his lordship's chaplain, and chancellor of the said diocess of Carlisle; at Dalston, April the 1st. 1684.
titleStmt.author: Banks, Jonathan.
Tully, T. (Thomas), 1620-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Samuel Roycroft, for Robert Clavell ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
